  • Classes in uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.core used by uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.common 
    Class and Description
    BlockingControlLink
    A ControlLink that blocks a Processor from starting until another Processor has finished.
    DataLink
    A DataLink controls the flow of data in a Workflow.
    Processor
    A Processor is a Workflow component that controls the invocation of activities.
  • Classes in uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.core used by uk.org.taverna.scufl2.api.container 
    Class and Description
    Workflow
    A Workflow is a set of Processors and DataLinks between the Processors.
